name: UNIV_CHG_LN_MSG_HX
description: This table contains update history for the Universal Charge Line (UCL) masterfile.  This table can be used to link to Universal Charge Messages (UCM) to actually find the update details.

columns.name: UCL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the UCL record (UCL .1).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Each charge lineï¿½(UCL) can have multiple messages (UCM) associated with it.  The combination of UCL_ID and LINE make up a unique identifier for this message.

columns.name: MESSAGE_ID
columns.description: A history of Universal Charge Messages (UCM) that have updated this charge.
